channel.title: [317] Bronze Age Release V1.0
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to the first release of Bronze Age V1.0.[/b][/center]
[b]Introduction:[/b] [i]This is the first release of Bronze Age. This will not be the last released version as I have a lot to do with the development of this project. Please know this is my [b]first[/b] release on any RSPS Community. Therefore please bare with me. I'm only releasing this early release now so I can get checkpoints I would call them. Please know I may not add any type of Custom besides Skillcapes and Emotes. We'll have to see about that.[/i]
[b]Information:[/b] [i]This server is based off Deltascape. Though I started with a cleaner version of the base. I plan on making this base cleaner, and more efficient.[/i]
[center][b][size=12pt]Server Features:[/size][/b][/center] [code] 10/11/10 * Lag-Walking Fixed * Magic almost prefected * Source Cleanup (Conventions, Useless Spaces etc) * Starter added (500k Coins, 500 Runes Mind-Fire) * Woodcutting almost great (Tree Spirit added) * Fishing has been improved (Face towards spot, Accurate Fishing etc) * Shops have been added (A lot) * Doors fixed (Varrock, Falador, and Lumbridge) * Common bug for Women fixed (Couldn't attack) * Common Quest for Starters * Start of Fletching, and Firemaking * Magic tweaks (Freeze, you can now bind/Snare/Entangle/Ice Freeze any NPC) * Common Name Fixes (Fishing Items, and Spots) * Requirement against Slayer (Level 30 to being Slayer) 10/12/10 * Firemaking, Fishing, and Fletching skill has been complete. (I don't know about 100%) * Source cleaned more (Useless Dead Codes, Methods etc)[/code]
The rest of the features are here from the Original Deltascape base if not removed. Please know that some of the commands have been removed. You might have to add some of them.
[center][size=12pt][b]Media:[/b][/size][/center] The Home and Equipment: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Starting-1.jpg[/img]
Lag-Walking has been fixed: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture2-3-1.jpg[/img]
A lot of Doors have been fixed (Varrock, Lumbridge, and Falador): [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture3-2-1.jpg[/img]
Old Gameframe: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture5-1.jpg[/img]
Little Quest: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture6-1.jpg[/img]
The Shops will be changed next Version: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture7-1.jpg[/img]
Running has been modified: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture8-1.jpg[/img]
Spirit Tree added: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture9-1.jpg[/img]
Ending: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/picture10-1.jpg[/img]
Please know that I'm going to be using Deltascape a couple of times until I have it almost at least prefect. I know a lot of people don't like the source but people don't need to be lazy. Instead if they don't like the source they should modify it more and make it better.
Packaged Server: [url=http://uppit.com/hhm71406sxte/Bronze_Age_Packaged.rar]http://uppit.com/hhm71406sxte/Bronze_Age_Packaged.rar[/url] The server does [b]not[/b] have a Anti-Leech.
I hope that you all enjoy yourselves. Please give me some credits if using this base.
[b]Credits:[/b] * _Delta * Johnny J * Ix Soulcist xI (Me)
Thank You,
Ix Soulcist xI (James)

item.title: [317] Bronze Age Release V1.0
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

lotto320:

This is so rofl, No Unmute/Unjail/unban -.-

I don’t understand the point of bringing this thread back instead of bringing back the other version. Nevertheless, neither does the other version have those commands. I suppose people have never heard to learn to add them their selves. I cleaned some of the base out instead of adding more crap in. I was going to add my own written Ban, Mute, Kick, Jail etc in.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:24, topic:364183”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=460414.msg3370994#msg3370994 date=1287237405]
Hey could i possibly use this as a base for my project i’m working on?
[/quote]

It a release to the public mate. Anyone who wants to use it can use it.
At least give the proper credits. Assuming of this version, I would say about 5% for me and more than 30-40 for Johnny J.

Later it will be more for me. :)[/quote]
I understand it is for the public, but i don’t want to be a dick and not ask you first hahaha. Okay man thanks i will start the project and i will give you and johnny creds along the road.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Bronze Age Release V1.0
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’ve continued working on the server. This is not the last of the server, and I do not plan on quitting.

To be honest though; I can tell its going to be hard making this server faster so I may end up needing help in the future. At the moment I’m working on fixing some combat related things.

Thanks for all the comments and supports.

Read full topic
